required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Biparametric MRI in Prostate Cancer Screening: a Noninferior Randomized Controlled Study
clinical_study.official_title: Biparametric MRI in Prostate Cancer Screening: a Noninferior Randomized Controlled Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is a single centre non-inferiority randomized controlled trial in comparison of the bpMRI between the traditional pathway in prostate cancer screening

primary_outcome.measure: The proportion of men with clinically significant cancer
primary_outcome.description: The presence of a single biopsy core indicating disease of ISUP 2 or more

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of men with clinically insignificant cancer
secondary_outcome.description: The presence of a single biopsy core indicating disease of ISUP 1

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of men who do not undergo biopsy
secondary_outcome.description: The proportion of men who do not need for further biopsy in this trial

secondary_outcome.measure: The proportion of men with adverse events after the intervention
secondary_outcome.description: Any of the adverse events during the trial

arm_group.description: Man receive the bpMRI for Prostate cancer screening
Man receive the PSA blood test for Prostate cancer screening

intervention.description: Men go for the mpMRI for PCa screening, those who had a suspicious result will go for the next confirmation test
Men go for the PSA test for PCa screening, those who had a suspicious result will go for the next confirmation test

overall_official.affiliation: Shanghai East Hospital,Tongji University School of Medicine

facility.name: Shanghai East Hospital, Tongji University School of Medicine

patient_data.ipd_description: Once available, the results of this trial will be disseminated to an international peer-reviewed journal and presentations at international or national academic conferences. The data will be made available upon request to researchers a) who provide a methodologically sound proposal and b) whose proposed use of the data has been approved by an independent ethical review committee
patient_data.ipd_time_frame: Data will become available after publication with no end date
